actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 110-480.

official_title: A bill to modify the boundary of the Hopewell Culture National Historical Park in the State of Ohio, and for other purposes.
short_title: Hopewell Culture National Historical Park Boundary Adjustment Act

summary.text: Hopewell Culture National Historical Park Boundary Adjustment Act - Modifies the boundary of the Hopewell Culture National Historical Park in Ohio to include certain lands marked for inclusion in the Park. Permits the acquisition of lands added under this Act only from willing sellers.

titles.title: Hopewell Culture National Historical Park Boundary Adjustment Act
A bill to modify the boundary of the Hopewell Culture National Historical Park in the State of Ohio, and for other purposes.
